text: 5.7 Kis 12.5, 12.21, 13.7, Ais 53.7, Jon 1.29, 1 Pi 1.19, Lep 5.6, 5.12 Anɨb ak binɨb kɨli yis nedil dɨyokɨpal tek, nɨbi tap si tap tɨmel dɨyokɨnɨmɨb. Dɨyokem, bilet yis sek ma mɨdeb tek yenɨmɨb. Pen yad nepin, nɨbi bilet yis sek ma mɨdeb tek mɨdebɨm. Ñɨn awl Pasopa apal ak, ñɨn anɨb ak chag sipsip ñɨluk pak sɨbogolɨgɨpun. Pen nɨb nepɨm, pak sɨbogolɨgɨpun tek, kɨli Klays nop dɨl, chag sipsip ñɨluk tek paklel chɨnop nen kumak.
